entities.name: karkaroff

entities.name: madame maxime
entities.description: Madame Maxime's name is mentioned as she reacts to Professor Moody's comment with skepticism.

relationships.description: Professor Moody speculates that someone might be hoping Harry Potter will die for the prize money.
Karkaroff criticizes Professor Moody's behavior, suggesting it is unusual for a Defense Against the Dark Arts teacher.
